    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database()
        The constructor of the objects; creates 2 new ArrayLists.

    • Method Detail

      • Initialize

        public void Initialize(java.lang.String name,
                       int nrNodes,
                       int maxCapacityNode)
        Sets the name, number of nodes, and the maximum capacity of a node in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the database
        nrNodes - the number of nodes the database must contain at most
        maxCapacityNode - the number of entities a node must contain at most

      • createEntity

        public void createEntity(java.lang.String[] tokens)
        Creates a new entity for the database.
        Parameters:
        tokens - contains the name of an entity and the name and types of the attributes found in that entity

      • insert

        public void insert(java.lang.String[] tokens)
        Inserts a new entity in the database.
        Parameters:
        tokens - contains the name of an entity and the name and values of the attributes found in that entity

      • delete

        public boolean delete(java.lang.String entityName,
                      java.lang.String primaryKey)
        Deletes, if found, the entities with the same name as entityName and the same primary key as primaryKey.
        Parameters:
        entityName - the name of an entity
        primaryKey - the primary key of an entity
        Returns:
        returns true if the entity has been found and deleted from the database or else false

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String[] tokens)
        Updates an entity from the database replacing some of his attribute values with new ones.
        Parameters:
        tokens - the name and primary key of an entity followed by the name and new values of the attributes in that entity

      • whichEntity

        public Entity whichEntity(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of an entity
        Returns:
        returns the entity with the same name found in the list of entities

      • get

        public java.lang.String get(java.lang.String entityName,
                            java.lang.String primaryKey)
        Parameters:
        entityName - the name of an entity
        primaryKey - the primary key of an entity
        Returns:
        returns a string containing the nodes in which the entity can be found and its string representation

      • SnapshotDB

        public java.lang.String SnapshotDB()
        Returns:
        returns a string representation of the database or the message EMPTY DB in case it's empty

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup(java.lang.String databaseName,
                    long nano)
        Deletes all instances of entities that are older than nano.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - the name of the database
        nano - the time in nanoseconds
